http://dsmeet.com/welcome/

You have to join up but you can use a decal maker to make a really cool emblem for Mariokart.  You upload a photo or put in a URL and it'll turn that photo into the grid pattern so you can enter it into Mariokart.  I now have a really cool Grendel eyes emblem for Mariokart.
http://illinoiskart.livejournal.com/2787.html

I just played a few last night and managed to improve my WiFi record to 21-12.  It's the first decent margin of wins I've had, so am pretty happy and hope to keep winning.  This is Galen, by the way.  :)
http://illinoiskart.livejournal.com/2421.html
What racers/karts do you guys usually use?  I'm trying to cut my time.
http://illinoiskart.livejournal.com/2137.html
